thread.title: China unveils three-year action plan to improve EV charging infrastructure
thread.title_full: China unveils three-year action plan to improve EV charging infrastructure

title: China unveils three-year action plan to improve EV charging infrastructure
text:
China unveils three-year action plan to improve EV charging infrastructure
The plan aims to boost confidence and adoption with 28 million facilities planned for over 80 million EVs
China has launched a three-year action plan to enhance its electric vehicle charging infrastructure, aiming to bolster consumer confidence and accelerate the nationwide adoption of EVs.
